text: Kyo ekifaananyi kyabo abawaayo emmaali yaabwe nga banoonya kusiima kwa Katonda n'okusinziira ku kukkiriza kwabwe Katonda okwa namaddala, baba nga ennimiro eri ku ttaka eggimu neetonnyebwamu namutikwa wenkuba ebibala byayo nebyebazaamu emirundi ebiri nebweba tefunye namutikwa wa nkuba waakiri olufuuyirize. Bulijjo Katonda alabira ddala byonna byemukola
